author: Jeff Geerling
description:
Vintage Computer Festival Midwest 2025 was overwhelming (in a good way).

I'll tell you my favorite experiences and interactions with the vintage tech community in this video.

Some of the projects and products mentioned in this video:

  - VCF Midwest: https://www.vcfmw.org
  - yyzkevin PCMCIA Pico card: https://www.yyzkevin.ca/pico-pcmcia/
  - Open Source CRT analog board: https://github.com/tdaede/td-crt
  - Meshtastic 64 on C64: https://64jim64.blogspot.com/2025/09/meshtastic-64-meshtastic-radio-for.html
  - Juicy Crumb Systems: https://juicycrumb.com
  - Mac84 Video on Personics View Control System: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=41jCujsrHVg

Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/geerlingguy
Sponsor me on GitHub: https://github.com/sponsors/geerlingguy
Merch: https://www.redshirtjeff.com
2nd Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@GeerlingEngineering
3rd Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@Level2Jeff

Contents:

00:00 - Old computers, new tricks in Chicago
00:54 - Nostalgia for
title: Resurrecting old tech at VCF Midwest
